title: Benelli's Elle
description: Elle left home after college, in search of the father she had never known, only to discover untold heartache along the way caused by the Vengeful Demons MC.Now, a shell of her former self, Elle finds solace in the arms of Benelli. How can they find peace when a rival club is hell bent on revenge? When a trafficking ring gets a little close to home, The Unfortunate Souls MC takes matters into their own hands where Benelli and Elle get a little revenge of their own.
author: Debbie  Mitchell
